hero.heading: Optimized maintenance: corrective, preventive and predictive in a single place.
hero.subheading: EAM One integrates maintenance management with SAP Business One so you can plan and control your assets with full traceability and data-driven decisions.

value_props.title: Integration with SAP Business One
value_props.text: EAM One natively integrates maintenance management with the procurement and warehouse processes of SAP Business One.

value_props.title: Built to SAP standards
value_props.text: EAM One is a web application developed according to SAP's standards and recommendations, designed to require minimal intervention in each client's SAP functional model.

value_props.title: Hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
value_props.text: Maintenance management data is stored in a dedicated space for each client company on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.
